pageProduct.name: White Glo Diamond Series Advanced Teeth Whitening Kit
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

White Glo Diamond Series Professional Teeth Whitening System includes Daily maintenance whitening toothpaste and a mouth tray to whiten the upper and lower teeth in convenient 5-minute treatment time.

Whitening Treatment
A revolutionary new White Glo Diamond Series Whitening system lifts stains and removes yellowing on the surface of your teeth enamel safely - without abrasion! Formulated by dentists with the same ingredients they use in clinics to achieve fast effective results for a smile that shines bright like a diamond.

Daily Maintenance

Replace your ordinary toothpaste with White Glo Professional Choice for the best way to maintain your sparkling new smile.

White Glo Toothpaste should be used daily for anti-cavity protection and removal of plaque and stains for whiter teeth.

Safe peroxide Levels
Approved by Australian Government Standards

Product Claims: Safe Peroxide levels approved by Australian Government Standards.

Boxed Contents: Pack includes: 1x Whitening Gel (50mL), 1x Instant-Fit Mouth Tray, 1x Full size (150g) Professional Choice Toothpaste, 1x Instruction Leaflet.

Warnings

This product is not to be consumed. Use by children under 12 years of age or pregnant women is not recommended. People who have braces, colitis, bad gums, exposed roots, ulcers, periodontal disease must not use this product. Avoid prolonged contact of the bleaching gel with the gums. If tooth sensitivity or adverse symptoms occur cease use immediately.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

The ADA seal of approval applies to White Glo Professional Choice Toothpaste only.

Ingredients

White Glo Diamond Series Whitening Gel
Propylene Glycol, Glycerine, 9% Carbamide Peroxide, Carbomer 940, Triethanolamine, Peppermint Oil.

White Glo Professional Choice Toothpaste
Contains Fluoride (1,000 ppm F) - Calcium Carbonate, Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Sorbitol, Silica, Aroma (Flavour), Sodium Lauryl Sulphate, Carboxymethyl Hydroxyethylcellulose, Chondrus Crispus (Carrageenan), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Sodium Saccharin, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Sodium Monofluorophosphate 0.76% w/w.

Contains: Contains Fluoride: Sodium Monofluorophosphate 0.76% w/w.

White Glo Professional Choice Toothpaste
Contains Fluoride (1,000 ppm F).

Directions

- Apply White Glo Diamond Series whitening gel directly on the Instant-Fit Mouth Tray.
- Place the mouth tray into your mouth for 5 - 15 minutes. Use daily for one week.
- Brush with the BONUS White Glo Toothpaste daily and see results within 7 days.
- Further information included in instruction card inside box.
